sourcesContent:
import "../css/MinorInjuryLogCSS.css" import "../images/icons/FVSRA_ICON.png" import logo from ".//PDRMA Form 03 Property Loss Report_files/Image_001.jpg" import {useState} from "react"; const MinorInjury = () => { const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [time, setTime] = useState(''); const [injury, setInjury] = useState(''); const [injuryLocation, setInjuryLocation] = useState(''); const [treatment, setTreatment] = useState(''); const [injuryOccur, setInjuryOccur] = useState(''); const [facility, setFacility] = useState(''); const [staffName, setStaffName] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { //Handles the onSubmit action of the log e.preventDefault(); } return (
Date Time Name of Injury Injury Location Treatment How injury occurred Facility/Location where injury occurred Full Name of staff who noticed guardian
setDate(e.target.value)} id="date" /> setTime(e.target.value)} id="time" /> setInjury(e.target.value)} id="injury" required /> setInjuryLocation(e.target.value)} id="injury-location" required /> setTreatment(e.target.value)} id="treatment" required /> setInjuryOccur(e.target.value)} id="injury-occur" required /> setFacility(e.target.value)} id="facility" required /> setStaffName(e.target.value)} required />
); } export default MinorInjury;
